entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 13 except minus 20 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023
